original_text: Nahash said, ‘I will make an agreement with you only if you let me do this. I must cut out the right eye of every person in your town. I want to bring shame on all Israel's people.’
korean_text: 암몬 사람 나하스가 그들에게 이르되 내가 너희 오른 눈을 다 빼야 너희와 언약하리라 내가 온 이스라엘을 이같이 모욕하리라

sentences.original_text: I will make an agreement with you
only if you let me do this
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 너희가 내가 이것을 하도록 허락하면

sentences.original_text: I must cut out the right eye
of every person in your town
